mm_dntme_help_browsing.message: Turn tracker blocking on or off across all sites.

mm_dntme_help_card.message: Premium feature: Turn card panels (that offer option to mask your card on website forms) on or off across all sites.

mm_dntme_help_email.message: Turn email panels (that offer option to mask your email on website forms) on or off across all sites.

mm_dntme_help_global_defaults.message: These settings apply to all websites you visit.

mm_dntme_help_helpmelogin.message: Since your Masked Emails are often used as logins for websites, we can automatically type them into email boxes on login forms for you.

mm_dntme_help_others.message: Let us know why you turned off blocking here:

mm_dntme_help_phone.message: Premium feature: Turn phone panels (that offer option to mask your phone on website forms) on or off across all sites.

mm_dntme_help_shouldsenderrorreports.message: To help us improve the product, enabling this preference sends anonymous error and usage data to our servers.

mm_dntme_help_showintheknowgrowls.message: Notifies you of websites that have suffered a data breach (on the top right of your browser screen) as you browse the web.

mm_dntme_help_showmedals.message: Privacy Medals are meant to be a fun form of encouragement for stopping lots of trackers.

mm_dntme_help_shownotifications.message: DoNotTrackMe occasionally shows notifications on the top right of your browser screen (like when you create a new Masked Email).

mm_dntme_help_showtrackersonload.message: Displays the number of trackers blocked for every website (on the top right of your browser screen) as you browse the web.

mm_dntme_help_showweeklyreports.message: A summary report of your blocked trackers is presented to you every Sunday.

mm_dntme_help_suggestions.message: Based on user feedback we sometimes unblock certain trackers by default to allow some websites to function properly.

mm_dntme_help_trusted_browsing.message: Select if you trust that they don't track your browsing

mm_dntme_help_trusted_card.message: Select if you trust that they don't lose your credit card

mm_dntme_help_trusted_email.message: Select if you trust that they don't spam your email

mm_dntme_help_trusted_phone.message: Select if you trust that they don't spam your phone

mm_dntme_help_trusted_sites.message: List of websites you trust with your personal information.

mm_dntme_helpmelogin.message: Auto fill masked emails for logins

mm_dntme_service_unavailable.message: Oops. Looks like there was a problem retrieving data. Try refreshing the page with your browser. If this continues to happen, check out our server maintenance page or contact our support team.

mm_dntme_thanks_for_feedback.message: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

mm_payment_error.message: Oops! Something went wrong. Click to report this issue.

mm_payment_error_abine.message: Oops! There's been a serious error. Please try again, and contact us ASAP.

mm_payment_error_banned_domain.message: We're sorry, but $1 does not allow purchases with Masked Cards. You'll unfortunately need to use your real credit card to shop here.

mm_payment_error_billing.message: Sorry, there was an error charging your card on file. If this is a mistake, please contact us.

mm_payment_error_declined.message: Sorry, your card on file was declined. Please update your information or contact us.

mm_payment_error_duplicate_card_ban.message: Sorry, but your account has been restricted due to using a credit card tied to a previous account in our system. Please contact support to remove this restriction.

mm_payment_error_global_limit.message: Sorry, you have reached a temporary limit on creating Masked Cards. Please try again later or contact us for immediate assistance.

mm_payment_error_grey_listed.message: Please verify your credit card so that you can create Masked Cards. This verification process ensures you are the legitimate owner of your credit card.

mm_payment_error_hard_limit.message: You have been temporarily suspended from creating Masked Cards. Please contact our support team to remove these restrictions.

mm_payment_error_high_risk_country.message: Sorry, but Masked Cards are only available to U.S. users at this time. We will be adding international support soon. Contact support for any questions.

mm_payment_error_provider.message: Sorry, there was an error retrieving a Masked Card. Please try again later, or contact us.

mm_payment_error_refund.message: Sorry, we cannot retrieve a Masked Card and failed to issue a refund. We are working to resolve the error. Please contact us ASAP.

mm_payment_error_rejected_domain.message: We're sorry, but $1 does not allow purchases with Masked Cards. You'll unfortunately need to use your real credit card to shop here.

mm_payment_error_soft_limit.message: Sorry, there are temporary limits on Masked Cards. To lift these limits, verify your card.

mm_payment_error_validation_input.message: Sorry, the amount must be a valid amount in dollars and cents.

mm_payment_error_validation_max.message: Sorry, the maximum amount for a Masked Card is $1. To increase this limit, verify your card.

mm_payment_error_validation_min.message: Sorry, the minimum amount for a Masked Card is $1.

mm_payment_error_validation_verified.message: Sorry, the amount must be between $1 and $2. Please try again.

mm_payment_error_verified_soft_limit.message: Sorry, there are temporary limits on Masked Cards. Please contact us if you'd like these lifted.

mm_payment_helper_non_us1.message:
We apologize, but Masked Cards are currently only available to U.S. users. International support will arrive in 2014. Please note that Masked Phones is still available outside of the U.S.
Even better, as a way to make it up to our international users, we don't charge you extra for receiving and making masked calls (even though it costs us extra!).
